creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
The document properties «visible in navigation» and «navigation title» of
live-documents can be changed without deactivating them first. This results in
an inconsistency betweent live and authoring sitetrees.

I guess it is sufficient to invoke an "edit" event when changing the navigation
title so that the documents can be republished.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The "edit" workflow event is now invoked

- on all translations for "change visibility"
- on the document for "change navigation title"
